personal.name: Mwafaq N. Abu-Shanab
personal.title: AI-Powered Business Consultant & Million-Dollar Company Builder
personal.tagline: Building ultra-lean AI companies: 3-5 people, million-dollar outcomes. AI agents handle everything else.
personal.bio:
I help ambitious entrepreneurs build ultra-lean million-dollar AI companies. The future isn't massive teams or billion-dollar giants—it's intelligent 3-5 person companies with AI agents handling Sales, HR, Marketing, and Operations.

My team and I guide you from concept to $1M+ valuation by replacing traditional departments with AI agents and smart automation. Whether you need help with sales processes, HR workflows, customer service, or any other department—we'll get you there with AI-first solutions.

Beyond building companies, I'm a proud father of four (including triplets!) and fluent in multiple languages, helping me connect with diverse entrepreneurs worldwide.

services.title: Ultra-Lean AI Company Builder
services.description: Build your million-dollar company with just 3-5 people and AI agents. My team and I replace traditional departments with intelligent automation.
features: Ultra-Lean Team Architecture: 3-5 People + AI Agents
AI Sales Agents: Automated Lead Gen, Nurturing & Closing
AI HR Systems: Recruiting, Onboarding & Performance Management
AI Marketing: Content Creation, Social Media & Ad Optimization
AI Operations: Finance, Legal, Customer Service & Support

services.title: LinkedIn Executive Coaching & Training
services.description: Master LinkedIn for business growth, thought leadership, and client acquisition with personalized coaching.

services.title: AI-Powered Workflow Automation
services.description: Design and implement intelligent workflows that scale with AI at the core.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: CTO, TechFlow Solutions
testimonials.content: MA Loom transformed our chaotic development process into a well-oiled machine. We went from 6-week sprints to 2-week deliveries with 40% fewer bugs. The automation workflows they built saved us 15 hours per week.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Operations Director, Global Manufacturing Inc
testimonials.content: The workflow optimization and agile transformation delivered immediate results. Our time-to-market improved by 50%, and team satisfaction scores increased dramatically. Mwafaq's approach is both practical and transformative.

testimonials.name: Dr. Priya Patel
testimonials.title: Chief Innovation Officer, HealthTech Solutions
testimonials.content: Working with MA Loom was a game-changer for our product development. The LoomMap workshops identified bottlenecks we didn't even know existed. Now we ship features that actually solve real problems.
testimonials.results: 3x improvement in feature adoption, 60% faster releases
